name: Cube - The Jumper
description: In front of you is a touching 2D-platformer, the central character of which is a simple red cube. There are many dangerous obstacles and surprises ahead!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Celeron, Single Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 200 MB available space
